name: pacbio-dextractor
description:
The Dextractor and Compression Command Library. This is a special fork
required by some pacbio utilities.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependent_to.name: falcon
dependent_to.description:
Falcon: a set of tools for fast aligning long reads for consensus and
assembly. The Falcon tool kit is a set of simple code collection which I
use for studying efficient assembly algorithm for haploid and diploid
genomes. It has some back-end code implemented in C for speed and some
simple front-end written in Python for convenience.
